No reaction from the foul man. Lifeless eyes beneath the mask
"The tall monster of a man seems to have rash all over its body.
The rash seems to focus on the neck area and possibly to face
and head, but that is impossible to tell because of the mask."
"The mask itself has melted on the patient's face and formed
a light layer of exoskeleton-like crust that continues from
"Despite somewhat large frame, the man seems to be weak against
piercing attacks as well as otherwordly powers."

GabText You can't see your legs, but something feels broken down there...
GabText You feel excruciating pain in your legs...
GabText You keep fading in and out of consciousness...
GabText You can't shake the idea... Your legs...
GabText You feel dizzy, light-headed and hopeless.
GabText This must be it for you...
"There...\. It's not much, but at least you're patched up now..."
"Listen, I'll create a diversion and lead those poor people elsewhere.
You have to get yourself out of here in the meanwhile."
"Here are your clothes and equipment. Get dressed quickly."
"I know it's a lot to ask,\. but do try your best, yes?"
"I'll find you later. Just try to survive until then."
You hear faint sounds coming from the crack on the wall...
\}"It is not safe master. You should leave. Or crawl into a tiny hole."\{
